name: Good Luck Charm, Nadeko Sengoku
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Strange》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes Reverse@, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I think Lala and the others are up to something.

name: Master-servant Relationship, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is six or higher, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: My master hasn't lost to you yet.

name: The Way Back, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Strange》 characters get +1 level and +500 power. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card with "Experience" get +1000 power."
flavorText: But perhaps we are not, my master――

name: Blessing of the Moon, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power."
flavorText:
I like the "tsuki," from "moon," part.
The sun is my enemy―― but the moon has been quite good to me.

name: Words of "Courage", Mayoi Hachikuji
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is not a 《Strange》 character, put it into your clock. (If it is, the revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: So cool! So cool, I'm tempted to have the courage to show you my panties as you wish!

name: Serious Mode, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Encounter in the Ruins" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +6000 power and your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore". （Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore ［(3)］" rule either.)
flavorText:
We can fight there to our hearts content.
I'll show you the difference that years of experience make.

name: Sake of Cooperation, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other characters you have is one or less, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText:
Oh, no... Oh, no, what cruel fate forces me
to obey the orders of a lesser being like this human.

name: Primp and Proper, Nadeko Sengoku
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Strange》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Welcome" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I-I definitely didn't work up the courage to change my hairstyle because you were coming over to my house for the first time.

name: Vampire's Dignity, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I will not allow any more of this.

name: Resident of the Shadows, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Master-servant Relationship, Shinobu Oshino" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position this card was on.
flavorText: See you soon, then, bye.

name: Flower Garden Shinobu Oshino
text: 【AUTO】 If the number of 《Blood》 characters you have is one or less, this card cannot be played from your hand.
flavorText: Wah-!

name: Sudden Attack, Koyomi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Flower Garden Shinobu Oshino" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Flower Garden Shinobu Oshino" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: Ooh――

name: Shinobu Oshino in the Shadows
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavorText: Very true――

name: First Visitor, Nadeko Sengoku
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Eh!?

name: Shinobu Oshino in a Good Mood
flavorText: I suppose I could tell you about the posed look one.

name: Blond with Gold Eyes, Shinobu Oshino
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Being Bashful, Mayoi Hachikuji
flavorText: I was bashful!

name: Ritual One Level Higher
text: Search your deck for up to two 《Strange》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: That isn't enough, I request a ritual one level higher.

name: Encounter in the Ruins
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: You're a minor Far Eastern monster, lacking even extant texts about her. I'll see to it that you can't ever have a posed look again.

name: Welcome
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.) (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Come in, Big Brother Koyomi.

name: “Fire Sisters” Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one character with "Experience", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Oh, it's you, Big Brother. I thought it was an enemy.

name: As Lovers, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes Reverse@, if a card named "Sandy Beach for Two" is in your climax area, choose up to one of your other characters, 【REST】 it, move it to an open position of your back stage, and this card gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Combat Role, Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Benefactor's Advice, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Girl Who Knows Anything" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
The real problem in a fight comes after you've made up.
――Keep that in mind.

name: Girl Who Was Given a Bee, Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is three or higher, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if a card named "KAREN Bee" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: We're not playing at anything. We ARE heroes of justice, Big Brother.

name: Someone to Protect, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn." 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText:
If you want to get past me, you'll have to defeat me――
Can you do that?

name: “Wreathe-fire Bee” Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your other characters and this card, exchange them as 【STAND】, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You're my pride.

name: Bigger of the Sisters, Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your other characters with "Tsukihi(月火)" in its card name get +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Immortal Strange, Tsukihi Araragi" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Immortal Strange, Tsukihi Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: So get back to your room and study.

name: “Fake” Deishu Kaiki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards and "Backup"from your hand."
flavorText: Come to think of it, I didn't actually apologize.

name: Sharp Intuition, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +1000. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes Reverse@, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText: Or maybe it's five? The number of girls you've played with today.

name: Brushing Teeth, Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Teeth Brushing Time" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Light-hearted, Karen Araragi
flavorText: It's a lot lighter-

name: Playing With Cards, Suruga Kanbaru
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup"from hand.
flavorText: Boo……

name: A Morning Sight, Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Wreathe-fire Bee” Karen Araragi" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position this card was on.
flavorText: Brother! Hey, it's morning!

name: Tutor, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavorText: Get this solved tonight. You have to start studying again tomorrow――

name: Pride of an Elder Brother, Koyomi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Karen(火憐)" or "Tsukihi(月火)" in its card name get +500 power.
flavorText: That way of thinking is dangerous. It's about as far from justice as you can get.

name: Celebrity of Tsuganoki 2nd Middle School, Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
……sometimes, Big Brother, you're hotter than fire.
I'm in love.

name: “What is Justice” Karen Araragi
flavorText: And the good guys always win, so you can't lose――

name: Family Bond, Karen Araragi
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
I could. With a smile on my face.
She's my little sister――Of course I could.

name: Innocence, Suruga Kanbaru
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 one of your characters] Choose one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Now I have no choice but to prove my innocence――!

name: Mischievous Nature, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: So I just made a small request. "If you won't be a good girl, I'll ask Araragi to be my boyfriend."

name: Teeth Brushing Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Big Brother……

name: Sandy Beach for Two
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Girl Who Knows Anything
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Yeah, it's fine. I was just doing some afternoon studying.

name: KAREN Bee
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: B-Big Brother.

name: Cuckoo Girl, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have a card named "Platinum Mad" in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two 《Japanese Clothes》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavorText: We're not heroes of justice, we're justice itself, Big Brother.

name: Immortal Strange, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: See you.

name: Farewell to the Past, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, perform the following action. "Choose a 《Strange》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: Be gentle to me tonight.

name: “Phoenix” Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your draw phase, deal one damage to yourself. (This damage may be canceled)

name: Sense of Liberation, Suruga Kanbaru
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +1000. 【AUTO】 [【REST】 one of your other 【STAND】 《Strange》 characters] When a card named "Handling Memories" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: No matter how liberated I feel when naked, I only go outside naked occasionally――

name: Celebrity of Tsuganoki 2nd Middle School, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Do you have any regrets, Big Brother?

name: Usual Parting, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your clock] When this card attacks, if a card named "I flubbed it!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal five damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Yeah, let's meet again.

name: Promise Exchange, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: 【AUTO】 Experience When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of the cards in your level is four or higher, choose a 《Strange》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: If I'm ever in really bad trouble again, would you help me?

name: Accelerator, Suruga Kanbaru
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: Suruga Kanbaru. Primary weapon, accelerator.

name: Matters of Younger Sisters, Koyomi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Girl Who Was Given a Bee, Karen Araragi" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Girl Who Was Given a Bee, Karen Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.) 【AUTO】 Bond/"“Fire Sisters” Tsukihi Araragi" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Fire Sisters” Tsukihi Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
……she got what was coming to her.
It's her fault for getting involved with someone like you.

name: “Fire Sisters” Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes Reverse@, if the number of your other 《Japanese Clothes》 characters is two or more, and this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may Reverse@ that character in battle.
flavorText: Don't just grow up and leave us behind.

name: Advisor Role, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +3000 power. 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: Don't bother coming home. There's no home for you!

name: Passionate Personality, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets the following ability."【AUTO】 When this card becomes Reverse@, if this card’s battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may Reverse@ that character.". 【AUTO】 [①] When this card attacks, if a card named “TSUKIHI Phoenix” is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a level 2 or lower character in your opponent’s center stage and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: Big Brother, how long will you be taking that bath?

name: Loves Kimono, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You know how I always say I'm "platinum" mad? It was originally "pretty" mad, so it doesn't mean that I'm so mad, the word "platinum" comes to mind.

name: Smaller of the Sisters, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Brushing Teeth, Karen Araragi" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Brushing Teeth, Karen Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: Mm?

name: Tea Ceremony Club, Tsukihi Araragi
flavorText: Big Brother. Heading out again?

name: A Morning Sight, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your red characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You really need to get up now!

name: Unexpected Words, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Koyomi(暦)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: ……Oh, no. That's really cool.

name: Secret Conversation, Mayoi Hachikuji
flavorText: Really, it's nothing but a secret!

name: “Pervert” Suruga Kanbaru
flavorText: Huh.

name: Usual Occurrence
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Japanese Clothes》 or 《Sports》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: No!

name: TSUKIHI Phoenix
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: "Any wound heals instantly, any illness vanishes immediately, it lives out its lifespan. And then it dies―― and is reborn."

name: I flubbed it!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I bit you!

name: Handling Memories
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: My memories are always in my heart.

name: Platinum Mad
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Don't get cocky, just because you have some muscle now!

name: Koyomi Araragi Heading for Battle
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Family Matters" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +3500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes Reverse@, you may put that character on the top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: Hah… hah…

name: Hairband, Nadeko Sengoku
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.
flavorText: The word of Life is law.

name: Sisters' Helper, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: That's true.

name: Shikigami, Yotsugi Ononoki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
Devilish big brother. You seem to have a knack for finding yourself
in the company of immortal apparitions.

name: Unlimited Rulebook, Yotsugi Ononoki
flavorText: "Unlimited Rulebook."――I said, with a posed look.

name: Way Back, Tsubasa Hanekawa
flavorText:
You haven't been slacking at all.
I know that very well.

name: Playing Together, Nadeko Sengoku
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Then let's play the Game of Life, Big Brother Koyomi.

name: Onmyoji, Yozuru Kagenui
text: 【ACT】 [(2)] This card gets +2500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Even if you don't allow us, what can you do to stop us?

name: Loser's Bravado
text: Look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two cards from among them, and put them into your hand. Put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Strange》 characters you have.
flavorText: I was about to make my big comeback. Don't worry about me when you don't have to, Big Sister――

name: Family Matters
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: They aren't "other people". They are my family.

name: Vanpire's Bond, Shinobu Oshino
flavorText:
I've told you a bunch of times that the bonds of a vampire are
bonds of the soul, right?

name: Friendly Sisters, Tsukihi Araragi & Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, Rest@ all of your other 【STAND】 characters.

name: Burning Girl, Karen Araragi
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Community service. Just a bit of volunteer work.

name: A Sister to Be Proud Of, Karen Araragi
text: 【ACT】 [REST one of your "Strange" characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Tsukihi Araragi & Karen Araragi & Nadeko Sengoku
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as REST@)
flavorText: Karen: "Seems I'll have a heroic tale to tell tonight."

name: Celebrity of Tsuganoki 2nd Middle School, Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
……sometimes, Big Brother, you're hotter than fire.
I'm in love.

name: Brushing Teeth, Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Teeth Brushing Time" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Light-hearted, Karen Araragi
flavorText: It's a lot lighter-

name: A Morning Sight, Karen Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Wreathe-fire Bee” Karen Araragi" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position this card was on.
flavorText: Brother! Hey, it's morning!

name: Mischievous Nature, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: So I just made a small request. "If you won't be a good girl, I'll ask Araragi to be my boyfriend."

name: “Wreathe-fire Bee” Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your other characters and this card, exchange them as 【STAND】, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You're my pride.

name: Teeth Brushing Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Big Brother……

name: Smaller of the Sisters, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Brushing Teeth, Karen Araragi" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Brushing Teeth, Karen Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: Mm?

name: Tea Ceremony Club, Tsukihi Araragi
flavorText: Big Brother. Heading out again?

name: Advisor Role, Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +3000 power. 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: Don't bother coming home. There's no home for you!

name: “Pervert” Suruga Kanbaru
flavorText: Huh.

name: TSUKIHI Phoenix
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: "Any wound heals instantly, any illness vanishes immediately, it lives out its lifespan. And then it dies―― and is reborn."

name: Platinum Mad
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Don't get cocky, just because you have some muscle now!

name: “Hero of Justice” Karen Araragi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavorText: "The older of my sisters, Karen Araragi. A third-year in middle school, had a birthday at the end of June, turning fifteen――"

name: Heroes of Justice Game, Karen Araragi & Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Sports》 or 《Japanese Clothes》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: "My prides. My little sisters I'm so proud of. Fakes, but because of that, closer than anything to the real thing. The Fire Sisters rushed out of the house to do battle like a lit firecracker."

name: Noisy Morning, Karen Araragi & Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Karen: "Brother! Hey, it's morning!"
Tsukihi: "You really need to get up now!"

name: “Hero of Justice” Tsukihi Araragi
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: "And the younger of my sisters, Tsukihi Araragi. A second-year in middle school, her birthday falls in early April, which makes her fourteen now――"
